Localization.Title: Gollum, Convinced to Help
Localization.Text: After scaring off the bats and other creatures and calming the creature, he starts talking, interspersed with this hacking noise that sounds like "gollum." He says he knows you look for the hobbit and knows where they took him. He will take you "Along a secret way, away from nasty prying eyes, yes, gollum." Should you trust this foul creature...?
